tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiseaseData (
    disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    outbreak_date DATE,
    prevalence_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE outbreaks (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 disease_id INT NOT NULL,
 location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id),
    disease_id INT REFERENCES diseases(disease_id),
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
    outbreak_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50),
    outbreak_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    affected_population INT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchPublications (
    publication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    authors VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id),
    funding_source VARCHAR(100)
);
